content: a great beginners pattern the pill purse is a quick and easy way to organise that ever expanding handbag it s a great way to have those necessary tablets hidden i have to take quite alot of tablets for the rest of my life wherever i go i have to have these with me fed up with searching for my pills in the bottom whatever handbag i was using i decided i d make a pill purse i now never leave home without it use any yarn you like any hook size you like gauge isnt important the stitches should be tight to create a sturdy purse it s a great way to use some of that leftover yarn we all seem to have
